org.latency4j.persistence

Interface WorkDurationPersistenceManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultWorkDurationPersistenceManager

    public interface WorkDurationPersistenceManager

    This interface defines the contract to which Latency4J persistence managers have to adhere. An instance of this type is responsible for persisting, and loading, durations to, and from, persistent storage.

    Each requirement is associated with a persistence manager, either explicitly through configuration or implicitly at runtime.

    Note:Instances of this class must be initialised prior to use.

      • save

        void save(WorkDuration taskDuration)

        Persists the supplied duration.

        Parameters:
        taskDuration - The duration to persist.

      • loadHistoricalData

        java.util.List<WorkDuration> loadHistoricalData(java.lang.String workCategory)

        Loads all previously persisted duration instances for the given category, where such instances exist in the backing persistent storage.

        Parameters:
        workCategory - The category of the requirement whose associated durations should be loaded.
        Returns:
        A list of previously saved duration instances for the given category, where they exist in the backing persistent store.
